DatabaseExists

data.name: DeleteById
data.value: set nocount on; delete from [{0}] where StructureId = @id;

data.name: DeleteByIds
data.value: set nocount on; delete from [{0}] where StructureId in (select Id from @ids);

data.name: DeleteByQuery
data.value: set nocount on; delete from [{0}] where StructureId in({1});

data.name: DeleteWhereIdIsBetween
data.value: set nocount on; delete from [{0}] where StructureId >= @idFrom and StructureId <= @idTo;

data.name: DropDatabase
DropStructureTables
ExistsById
data.value: set nocount on; select 1 from [{0}] where StructureId =@id;

data.name: GetAllJson
data.value: set nocount on; select Json from [{0}] order by [StructureId];

data.name: GetJsonById
data.value: set nocount on; select Json from [{0}] where StructureId =@id;

data.name: GetJsonByIds
data.value: set nocount on; select Json from [{0}] where StructureId in (select Id from @ids);

data.name: GetJsonByIdWithLock
data.value: set nocount on; select Json from [{0}] with(xlock, rowlock) where StructureId =@id;

data.value: set nocount on; delete from [{0}] where [{1}] in({2});

data.value: set nocount on; select distinct [{0}] from [{1}];

data.name: Query
QueryReturningStructureIds
data.value: [%Start%] select distinct s.[StructureId] from [[%MainStructureTable%]] s [%WhereAndSortingJoins%][%WhereCriteria%] [%End%]

data.name: RowCount
data.value: set nocount on; select count(1) from [{0}];

data.name: SingleInsertOfStringTypeIndex
data.value: set nocount on; insert into [{0}] ([{1}], [{2}], [{3}]) values (@{1}, @{2}, @{3});

data.name: SingleInsertStructure
data.value: set nocount on; insert into [{0}] ([{1}], [{2}]) values (@{1}, @{2});

data.name: Sys_Identities_CheckOutAndGetNextIdentity
Sys_Identities_CreateIfNotExists
Sys_Types_CreateIfNotExists
data.value:
use [{0}]; set nocount on; if(select 1 from sys.table_types where is_table_type = 1 and is_user_defined = 1 and name = 'SisoGuidIds') is null begin create type SisoGuidIds as table (Id uniqueidentifier primary key not null); end
if(select 1 from sys.table_types where is_table_type = 1 and is_user_defined = 1 and name = 'SisoIdentityIds') is null begin create type SisoIdentityIds as table (Id bigint primary key not null); end
if(select 1 from sys.table_types where is_table_type = 1 and is_user_defined = 1 and name = 'SisoStringIds') is null begin create type SisoStringIds as table (Id nvarchar(16) primary key not null); end
if(select 1 from sys.table_types where is_table_type = 1 and is_user_defined = 1 and name = 'SisoIntegers') is null begin create type SisoIntegers as table ([Value] bigint null); end
if(select 1 from sys.table_types where is_table_type = 1 and is_user_defined = 1 and name = 'SisoFractals') is null begin create type SisoFractals as table ([Value] real null); end
if(select 1 from sys.table_types where is_table_type = 1 and is_user_defined = 1 and name = 'SisoDates') is null begin create type SisoDates as table ([Value] datetime2 null); end
if(select 1 from sys.table_types where is_table_type = 1 and is_user_defined = 1 and name = 'SisoBooleans') is null begin create type SisoBooleans as table ([Value] bit null); end
if(select 1 from sys.table_types where is_table_type = 1 and is_user_defined = 1 and name = 'SisoGuids') is null begin create type SisoGuids as table ([Value] uniqueidentifier null); end
if(select 1 from sys.table_types where is_table_type = 1 and is_user_defined = 1 and name = 'SisoStrings') is null begin create type SisoStrings as table ([Value] nvarchar(50) null); end
if(select 1 from sys.table_types where is_table_type = 1 and is_user_defined = 1 and name = 'SisoTexts') is null begin create type SisoTexts as table ([Value] nvarchar(50) null); end

data.name: TableExists
data.value: set nocount on; select 1 from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME=@tableName;

data.value: set nocount on; delete from [{0}] where [{1}] in({2});

data.value: set nocount on; select distinct [{0}] from [{1}];

data.name: DeleteIndexesAndUniquesById
SingleUpdateOfStructure
data.value: set nocount on; update [{0}] set [{1}] = @{1} where [{2}] = @{2};

data.name: DropTable
data.value: set nocount on; if object_id(N'{0}', N'U') is not null drop table [{0}];

data.name: GetTableNamesForAllDataTables
data.value: set nocount on; select TABLE_NAME from ( select 0 groupId, TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME like '%Booleans' union select 0, TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME like '%Dates' union select 0, TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME like '%Fractals' union select 0, TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME like '%Guids' union select 0, TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME like '%Integers' union select 0, TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME like '%Strings' union select 0, TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME like '%Texts' union select 0, TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME like '%Spatial' union select 1, TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME like '%Uniques' union select 2, TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME like '%Structure' ) tables order by groupId;

data.name: TruncateSisoDbIdentities
data.value: set nocount on; if object_id(N'[SisoDbIdentities]', N'U') is not null truncate table [SisoDbIdentities];

data.name: ClearIndexesTables
GetModelTableStatuses
data.value: set nocount on; select TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME in(@tableName0, @tableName1, @tableName2, @tableName3, @tableName4, @tableName5, @tableName6, @tableName7, @tableName8, @tableName9);

data.name: DropSp
data.value: if(select OBJECT_ID('{0}', 'P')) is not null begin drop procedure {0}; end

data.name: DeleteAllExceptIds
data.value: set nocount on; delete from [{0}] where StructureId not in (select Id from @ids);

data.name: DeleteAll
data.value: set nocount on; delete from [{0}];

data.name: QueryReturningCountOfStructureIds
data.value: set nocount on; [%Start%] select count(distinct s.[StructureId]) from [[%MainStructureTable%]] s [%WhereAndSortingJoins%][%WhereCriteria%] [%End%]
